thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 27 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Wright Medical Group ‍Q4 Net Sales $218 Million​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wright Medical Group ‍Q4 Net Sales $218 Million​
text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Wright Medical Group Nv:
* WRIGHT MEDICAL GROUP N.V. REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES 2018 ANNUAL GUIDANCE
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.25 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * SEES FY 2018 SALES ABOUT $800 MILLION TO $812 MILLION * SEES Q4 2017 SALES $217.6 MILLION * SEES Q4 2017 SALES UP 11.2 PERCENT * ‍Q4 2017 NET SALES OF $218 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
